Posts.Content: For those where the conventional cheme drugs and radiotherapy have failed, sre too uncortable to coninue now there is hope with Cytotron therapy that is virtually free of known side effects. having side effects. Cytotron is a new option for regenerative and degenerative tissue engineering with Rotational Field Quantum Magnetic Resonance RFQMR). Its regenerative potential is best seen in osteoarthritis knee where it is able to regenerate the joint cartilage and thus save several patients from joint / knee replacement.and provide pain relief, decreased deformity and comfortable movement to most patients treated for Osteoarthritis of the knee or other joints. Its degenerative potential is applicable in cancer where it arrests selective cell growth of the cancerous cells leaving the other cells unharmed. Patients treated have symptom relief, decreased tumor size and prolonged life. There are no known side effects. Details can be seen at www.sssibia.com.
Posts.Title: chemo or no chemo?
